column2: an A.M. Eatery////The food was outstanding! Everyone in my party started with fun drinks (which were half off since we are healthcare professionals). The food was delicious
column3: some in my group got eggs Benedict
column5: waffles and I tried the breakfast sandwich. The sausage was a little spicy on my sandwich but I had bites off everyone's plate and nothing on the table was bad. Highly recommend waiting for this place
